member.name: M:DBTek.Crypto.cHMACMD5.EncodeFile(System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Computes a keyed hash for a source file, creates a target file with the keyed hash prepended to the contents of the source file, then decrypts the file and compares the source and the decrypted files.
member.param: The key to use to encode the file
The file to encrypt complete path
Destination file complete path. If the file doesn't exist, it creates it

member.name: M:DBTek.Crypto.cHMACMD5.DecodeFile(System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Decrypt the encoded file and compare to original file. It returns false if the file is corrupted.
member.param: The key used to encode the file
The file to decrypt complete path
Destination file complete path. If the file doesn't exist, it creates it
